channel.title: How to make a npc talk?
channel.description:
How can i make a npc talk :confused:`
[u]NOT OVER HEAD[/u]
but when we click he....
like this:
NPC: Hello example would you like to go to varrock? Player: Yes please! or No! NPC: Here you go or Ok...
and we get teleported. Please help me

item.title: How to make a npc talk?
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

[quote=“de dust89, post:2, topic:285911”][code]Search for;

switch (NpcDialogue) {

and add at the very bottom…

                        case #:
				talk("Hello",NPCID);
				break;
			case #:
				choice("Yes Please!", "No!");
                                break;
                        case #:
				talk("Here you go..",NPCID);
				break;

give me the npc id and i will tell you what to do next…[/code][/quote]

Npc id = 0

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a npc talk?

give me the npc id and i will tell you what to do next…[/code]
